About Me

My name is Patricia Mey Kihara. I am a Full-Stack Web Developer based in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil.

My career path is a bit out-of-ordinary: after graduating from Law School, I felt frustrated by the lack of creative thinking. This is why I got into the Fashion industry, where I worked for 6 years as an Apparel and Accessories Designer. However, disheartened by the lack of a career path and intellectual stimulus, I decided it was time to challenge myself with something new.

As a person passionate about solving problems, learning and creating, I finally found something I love doing: programming. Thanks to my previous experiences, I have developed an analytical yet creative mindset that is team-oriented and attentive to detail.

I believe strong foundations with visually pleasant user experiences are the key to developing successful products and a better world.

Projects

Portfolio

Projects

Ruby's Adventures in Codeland

An online game to teach children basic Ruby commands. The game engine is in JavaScript ES6 with the back-end in Ruby on Rails.

Project developed by 4 people during Le Wagon bootcamp.

GitHub Live

Translapp

A marketplace application developed in Ruby on Rails to connect people in need of translation services with translators.

Project developed by 4 people during Le Wagon bootcamp.

GitHub Live

Pop-a-Corn Watchlist

Application to create movie watch lists with the user's comments. Developed in Ruby on Rails with movie details provided by an API.

Project developed during Le Wagon bootcamp.

GitHub Live
